posts.post_content:
In find it interesting that the "As long as you have 30 or more life" clause is still being used.
  
   
[Chalice of Life](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Chalice of Life) uses an "If you have 10 or more life than your starting life total"
  
   
It was designed with this in mind, probaly for EDH with [Vish Kal, Blood Arbiter](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vish Kal, Blood Arbiter)

Posted By: Mode (5/4/2013 2:36:26 AM)

posts.post_content:
The BANESLAYERS-   
Baneslayer. n.   
1) a CMC=5 creature that defines the Archetypal Creature type of a Color or Theme, is Standard Playable, is mildly Spike and costs too much before it rotates, is reprinted, or is obsoleted.  
  
2) any [Akroma](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Akroma) Knockoff of Stupidness and Awesomeness with the Mythic Rarity tacked on as justification. Usually has two protections.  
  
  
[Baneslayer Angel](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Baneslayer Angel)  
[Thragtusk](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Thragtusk) (Baneslayer Beast)  
[Thundermaw Hellkite](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Thundermaw Hellkite) (Baneslayer Dragon)  
[Blood Baron of Vizkopa](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Blood Baron of Vizkopa) (Baneslayer Vampire)  
[Shadowborn Demon](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Shadowborn Demon) (Baneslayer Demon)  
[Sphinx of the Steel Wind](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sphinx of the Steel Wind) (Baneslayer Sphinx)- when the Blue Artifact is the card \*\*\*ing the least number of people off, you have issues, lol. -\_- ;)  
  
Honorable Mention: [Jace, the Mind Sculptor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Jace, the Mind Sculptor) (Baneslayer Planeswalker) -only made the list to make sure that Blue remained, in fact, the Most Hated Color. ;O... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)
posts.html:
The BANESLAYERS-
Baneslayer. n.
1) a CMC=5 creature that defines the Archetypal Creature type of a Color or Theme, is Standard Playable, is mildly Spike and costs too much before it rotates, is reprinted, or is obsoleted.

2) any Akroma Knockoff of Stupidness and Awesomeness with the Mythic Rarity tacked on as justification. Usually has two protections.


Baneslayer Angel
Thragtusk (Baneslayer Beast)
Thundermaw Hellkite (Baneslayer Dragon)
Blood Baron of Vizkopa (Baneslayer Vampire)
Shadowborn Demon (Baneslayer Demon)
Sphinx of the Steel Wind (Baneslayer Sphinx)- when the Blue Artifact is the card ***ing the least number of people off, you have issues, lol. -_- ;)

Honorable Mention: Jace, the Mind Sculptor (Baneslayer Planeswalker) -only made the list to make sure that Blue remained, in fact, the Most Hated Color. ;O... (see all)

Posted By: DJCHiLL813 (4/26/2013 7:49:46 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
This guy is very resistant to removal. He has got a hardy 4 toughness which makes him burn resistant, and cant be targeted by [Oblivion Ring](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Oblivion Ring) or [Murder](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Murder).  
  
That being said, he is under the curve @4/4 lifelink for 5. The second ability involves a casual deck strategy, and could be called "win more". I see this being a great mythic for budget players to enjoy.  
  
4.5/5
posts.html:

4.5/5
